column4: i think it has to do with multiple windows being open; i think nautilus also 'remembers' where the windows were for when they're next opened
yes remember the places nautilus does
there's something called update-grub which might help you -- depends how you broke it, i guess
ok... where do i use update-grub? as an boot option from the cd?
but i can't reach my shell... my grub is broken, and i cannot boot...
i broke it when i was installing windows xp
there seems to be a wiki page related to this
the wiki page tells me i need a live cd... i don't have a live cd :(
i think you can start the install cd, and then use Ctl-Alt-F2 to switch to a console
